fields.Boolean.description: Common XML tag for field type Boolean

fields.Char.description: Common XML tag for field type Char

fields.Date.description: Common XML tag for field type Date

fields.Datetime.description: Common XML tag for field type Datetime

fields.Float.description: Common XML tag for field type Float

fields.Html.description: Common XML tag for field type Html

fields.Integer.description: Common XML tag for field type Integer

fields.Many2many.description: Common XML tag for field type Many2many

fields.Many2one.description: Common XML tag for field type Many2one

fields.One2many.description: Common XML tag for field type One2many

fields.Selection.description: Common XML tag for field type Selection

fields.Text.description: Common XML tag for field type Text

button1.body:
<button name="${1:function_name}"
        string="${2:string}"${4:
        type="${3:object}"}${5:
        special="cancel"}${7:
        default_focus="${6:0}"}${9:
        icon="${8:gtk-apply}"}${11:
        confirm="${10:message}"}${13:
        help="${12:message}"} />

form.body: ${0}
form.description: Common form tag to be added inside a ir.ui.view

graph.body:
<graph string="${1:Graph title}" type="${2:one # bar # pie # line # pivot}">
    <field type="row" name="${3:row_field}" />
    <field type="col" name="${4:col_field}" interval="month" />
    <field type="measure" name="${5:measure_field}" />
</graph>${0}
graph.description: Common graph tag to be added inside a ir.ui.view

filter.description: Common filter tag to be added inside a search view

search.description: Common search tag to be added inside a ir.ui.view

tree.description: Common tree tag to be added inside a ir.ui.view

xpath.description: Common xpath tag to be added inside a ir.ui.view

ir.ui.view.body:
<record id="view_${2/[^a-z]+/\_/g}_${3}" model="ir.ui.view">
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="model">${2:model.name}</field>
    <field name="type">${3:tree}</field>
    <field name="mode">${4:primary}</field>
    <field name="priority" eval="${5:16}" />
    <field name="active" eval="${6:True}" />${8:
    <field name="inherit_id" ref="${7:xml_id}" />}
    <field name="arch" type="xml">
        ${0}
    </field>
</record>

link.description: Link tag to inglude an stylesheet

script.description: Link tag to inglude an stylesheet

ir.filters.body:
<record id="${7:filter_${2/(\.)/\_/g}_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}}" model="ir.filters">
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="model_id">${2:model_name_whithout_module}</field>
    <field name="user_id" eval="${3:False}"/>
    <field name="domain">${4:[]}</field>
    <field name="context">${5:{}}</field>
    <field name="is_default" eval="${6:False}" />
    <!-- <field name="action_id" ref="" /> -->
</record>${8}

ir.ui.menu.body:
<record id="menu_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}" model="ir.ui.menu" >
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="sequence" eval="${2:10}" />${4:
    <field name="action" ref="${3:action_name}" />}${6:
    <field name="parent_id" ref="${5:base.menu_custom}" />}
</record>${0}

relativedelta.description: Fully formated time relative to now

assets.body:
<record id="view_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_assets" model="ir.ui.view">
    <field name="name">${1:module} assets</field>
    <field name="model"></field>
    <field name="type">qweb</field>
    <field name="mode">extension</field>
    <field name="priority" eval="${2:16}" />
    <field name="active" eval="${3:True}" />
    <field name="inherit_id" ref="web.assets_backend" />
    <field name="arch" type="xml">
        <xpath expr="." position="inside">${5:
            <link rel="stylesheet" href="/${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}/static/src/css/${4:styles}.css" />}${7:
            <script type="text/javascript" src="/${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}/static/src/js/${6:scripts}.js" />}${0}
        </xpath>
    </field>
</record>
assets.description: Include module assets in backend views

fullview.body:
view.${2/\.+/\./g}.tree ${2/\.+/\./g} tree primary ${0:} view.${2/\.+/\./g}.form ${2/\.+/\./g} form primary
view.${2/\.+/\./g}.search ${2/\.+/\./g} search primary ir.actions.act_window ${1/(.)/\1/g} ${2/\.+/\./g} tree,form form current ${4/(.)/\1/g} ${5/(.)/\1/g}

Click to add new ${1/(.)/\1/g}

${9/(.)/\1/g}

${1/(.)/\1/g}
fullview.description: Views: tree, form, search; act_window and menu

oe_chatter.description: Common XML to add a tracking area inside a form view

ir.model.access.body:
<record id="access_${1/^.*model_(.*)$/\1/g}_${2/((^.*group_$)|(\.))/(?2:group_)(?3:\_)/g}" model="ir.model.access">
    <field name="name">${1/^.*model_(.*)$/\1/g} ${2/((^.*group_$)|(\.))/(?2:group_)(?3:\_)/g}</field>
    <field name="model_id" ref="${1:ir.model}"/>
    <field name="group_id" ref="${2:res.groups}"/>
    <field name="perm_read" eval="${3:True}" />
    <field name="perm_create" eval="${4:True}" />
    <field name="perm_write" eval="${5:True}" />
    <field name="perm_unlink" eval="${6:True}" />
    <field name="active" eval="${7:True}" />
</record>${0}

ir.rule.body:
<record id="${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_rule" model="ir.rule">
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="model_id" ref="${3:model_xml_id}"/>
    <field name="global" eval="${4:True}" />
    <field name="perm_read" eval="${5:True}" />
    <field name="perm_create" eval="${6:True}" />
    <field name="perm_write" eval="${7:True}" />
    <field name="perm_unlink" eval="${8:True}" />
    <field name="domain_force">${9:['|',('company_id','=',False),('company_id','child_of',[user.company_id.id])]}</field>
    <field name="active" eval="${10:True}" />
</record>${0}

res.groups.body:
<record id="group_${8:${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}}" model="res.groups">
    <field name="name">${1:Name}</field>
    <field name="comment">${2:Comment}</field>
    <field name="category_id" ref="${3:base.module_category_administration}"/>
    <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('${5:base.group_user}'))]"/>
    <field name="users" eval="[(5, ref('${6:base.user_root}'))]" />
</record>${0}

t.body:
${2:Report title}

${0:

This object's name is

}

report.paperformat.body:
<record id="paperformat_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}" model="report.paperformat" >
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="format">${2:A4}</field>
    <field name="orientation">${3:Portrait}</field>
    <field name="default" eval="${4:False}" />
    <field name="dpi" eval="${5:90}" />
    <field name="margin_top" eval="${6:40}" />
    <field name="margin_right" eval="${7:7}" />
    <field name="margin_bottom" eval="${8:20}" />
    <field name="margin_left" eval="${9:7}" />
    <field name="header_line" eval="${10:False}" />
    <field name="header_spacing" eval="${11:35}" />${13:
    <field name="page_width" eval="${12:210}" />}${15:
    <field name="page_height" eval="${14:297}" />}${17:
    <field name="report_ids" eval="[(4, ref('${16:ir.actions.report.xml}'))]" />}${0}
</record>

fullreport.body:
${1/(.)/\1/g} ${3/(.)/\1/g} qweb primary
${0:

Report title

This object's name is

}
${1/(.)/\1/g} ${3/(.)/\1/g} qweb primary ${1/(.)/\1/g} ${3/(.)/\1/g} qweb-pdf ${2/(.)/\1/g}.view_${3/\./\_/g}_qweb (object.name+'.pdf') ${9/(.)/\1/g} ${1/(.)/\1/g} ${3/(.)/\1/g} action client_print_multi
fullreport.description: Report: document and translation; action.report.xml and ir.values

ir.actions.act_window.body:
<record id="action_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_act_window" model="ir.actions.act_window">
    <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field>
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="res_model">${2:model.name}</field>
    <field name="view_mode">${3:tree,form}</field>
    <field name="view_type">${4:form}</field>
    <field name="target">${5:current}</field>${7:
    <field name="domain">[${6:}]</field>}${9:
    <field name="context">${8:\{\}}</field>}${11:
    <field name="search_view_id" ref="${10:ir.ui.view}" />}
</record>${0}

ir.actions.act_window.view.body:
<record id="action_${1/[^a-zA-Z]+/\_/g}_${2/[^a-zA-Z]+/\_/g}" model="ir.actions.act_window.view">
    <field name="act_window_id" ref="${1:ir.actions.act_window}" />
    <field name="view_id" ref="${2:ir.ui.view}" />
    <field name="view_mode">${3:tree}</field>
    <field name="sequence" eval="${4:1}" />
    <field name="multi" eval="${5:False}" />
</record>

ir.actions.report.xml.body:
<record id="action_report_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}" model="ir.actions.report.xml">
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="model">${2:model.name}</field>
    <field name="report_type">${3:qweb-pdf}</field>
    <field name="report_name">${4:out_filename}</field>
    <field name="attachment_use" eval="${5:True}" />
    <field name="attachment">${6:(object.name+'.pdf')}</field>
    <field name="paperformat_id" ref="${7:report.paperformat_euro}" />${9:
    <field name="help">${8:Something about ${1}}</field>}
</record>${0}

ir.actions.server.body:
<record id="action_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_server" model="ir.actions.server">
    <field name="type">ir.actions.server</field>
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="model_id" ref="${2:ir.model}" />
    <field name="condition" eval="${3:True}" />
    <field name="sequence" eval="${4:5}" />
    <field name="context" eval="${5:\{\}}" />
    <field name="action_id" ref="${6:ir.actions.actions}" />
</record>${0}
ir.actions.server.description: Common record definition for ir.actions.server, invoking a client action

ir.actions.server1.body:
<record id="action_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_server" model="ir.actions.server">
    <field name="type">ir.actions.server</field>
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="model_id" ref="${2:ir.model}" />
    <field name="condition" eval="${3:True}" />
    <field name="sequence" eval="${4:5}" />
    <field name="context" eval="${5:\{\}}" />
    <field name="code">${6:action = self.browse(cr, uid, 1, context=context)}</field>
</record>${0}
ir.actions.server1.description: Common record definition for ir.actions.server, running Python code

ir.actions.server2.body:
<record id="action_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_server" model="ir.actions.server">
    <field name="type">ir.actions.server</field>
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="model_id" ref="${2:ir.model}" />
    <field name="condition" eval="${3:True}" />
    <field name="sequence" eval="${4:5}" />
    <field name="context" eval="${5:\{\}}" />
    <field name="child_ids" eval="[(6, ref('${6:ir.actions.server}'))]" />
</record>${0}
ir.actions.server2.description: Common record definition for ir.actions.server, executing multiple actions

ir.actions.server3.body:
<record id="action_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_server" model="ir.actions.server">
    <field name="type">ir.actions.server</field>
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="model_id" ref="${2:ir.model}" />
    <field name="condition" eval="${3:True}" />
    <field name="sequence" eval="${4:5}" />
    <field name="context" eval="${5:\{\}}" />
    <field name="use_create">${6:new}</field>${8:
    <field name="crud_model_id" ref="${7:ir.model}" />}${10:
    <field name="ref_object">${9:reference}</field>}${12:
    <field name="fields_lines" eval="[(4, ref('${11:ir.server.object.lines}'))]" />}${14:
    <field name="link_new_record" eval="${13:False}" />}${16:
    <field name="link_field_id" ref="${15:ir.model.fields}" />}
</record>${0}
ir.actions.server3.description: Common record definition for ir.actions.server, creating objects

ir.actions.server4.body:
<record id="action_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_server" model="ir.actions.server">
    <field name="type">ir.actions.server</field>
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="model_id" ref="${2:ir.model}" />
    <field name="condition" eval="${3:True}" />
    <field name="sequence" eval="${4:5}" />
    <field name="context" eval="${5:\{\}}" />
    <field name="use_write">${6:current}</field>${8:
    <field name="crud_model_id" ref="${7:ir.model}" />}${10:
    <field name="ref_object">${9:reference}</field>}${12:
    <field name="fields_lines" eval="[(4, ref('${11:ir.server.object.lines}'))]" />}${14:
    <field name="write_expression">${13:char}</field>}
</record>${0}
ir.actions.server4.description: Common record definition for ir.actions.server, updating objects

ir.actions.server5.body:
<record id="action_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_server" model="ir.actions.server">
    <field name="type">ir.actions.server</field>
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="model_id" ref="${2:ir.model}" />
    <field name="condition" eval="${3:True}" />
    <field name="sequence" eval="${4:5}" />
    <field name="context" eval="${5:\{\}}" />
    <field name="wkf_transition_id" ref="${6:workflow.transition}" />
    <field name="use_relational_model">${7:base}</field>${9:
    <field name="wkf_model_id" ref="${8:ir.model}" />}${11:
    <field name="wkf_field_id" ref="${10:ir.model.fields}" />}
</record>${0}
ir.actions.server5.description: Common record definition for ir.actions.server, triggering

ir.actions.todo.body:
<record id="action_todo_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}" model="ir.actions.todo">
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="type">${2:manual}</field>
    <field name="state">${3:open}</field>
    <field name="sequence" eval="${4:10}" />
    <field name="action_id" ref="${5:ir.actions.actions}" />${7:
    <field name="note">${6:Something about ${1}}</field>}
</record>${0}

ir.config_parameter.body:
<record id="${1/[^A-Za-z]/\_/g}" model="ir.config_parameter">
    <field name="key">${1:char}</field>
    <field name="value">${2:text}</field>${4:
    <field name="group_ids" eval="[(4, ref('${3:res.groups}'))]" />}
</record>${0}

ir.model.data.body:
<record id="${3/(\.+)/_/g}_${1/(\.+)/_/g}" model="ir.model.data">
    <field name="name">${1:resource_external_id}</field>
    <field name="model">${2:model.name}</field>
    <field name="module">${3:module_name}</field>
    <field name="date_init" eval="${4:time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}" />
    <field name="date_update" eval="${5:time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}" />
    <field name="res_id" eval="${6:1}" />
    <field name="noupdate" eval="${7:True}" />
</record>${0}

ir.model.body:
<record id="${1/(\.+)/_/g}_${2/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}" model="ir.model">
    <field name="model">${1:model_name}</field>
    <field name="name">${2:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="state">${3:Base | Manual}</field>
    <field name="info">${4:Description}</field>
</record>${0}

ir.module.category.body:
<record id="module_category_${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}" model="ir.module.category">
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="sequence" eval="${2:10}" />
    <field name="visible" eval="${3:True}" />
    <field name="description">${4:${1} category}</field>${6:
    <field name="parent_id" ref="${5:ir.module.category}" />}
</record>${0}

ir.values.body:
<record id="${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_values" model="ir.values">
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="model_id" ref="${2:module.model_external_id}" />
    <field name="model">${2/((^[^.]*.?model_)|([_]+))/(?2:)(?3:\.)/g}</field>
    <field name="value" eval="${4:'ir.actions.act_window,' +str(ref('${3:action_external_id}'))}" />
    <field name="key">${5:action}</field>
    <field name="key2">${6:tree_but_open}</field>${8:
    <field name="action_id" ref="${7:ir.actions.actions}" />}${10:
    <field name="res_id" eval="${9:1}" />}${12:
    <field name="company_id" ref="${11:res.company}" />}${14:
    <field name="user_id" ref="${13:res.users}" />}
</record>${0}

base.action.rule.body:
<record id="${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}" model="base.action.rule">
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="active" eval="${2:True}" />
    <field name="sequence" eval="${3:0}" />
    <field name="server_action_ids" eval="[(4, ref('${4:ir.actions.server}'))]" />
    <field name="model_id" ref="${5:ir.model}" />
    <field name="kind">${6:on_create_or_write}</field>
    <field name="trg_date_id" ref="${7:ir.model.fields}" />
    <field name="trg_date_range" eval="${8:0}" />
    <field name="trg_date_range_type">${9:day}</field>${11:
    <field name="trg_date_calendar_id" ref="${10:resource.calendar}" />}${13:
    <field name="filter_id" ref="${12:ir.filters}" />}${15:
    <field name="filter_pre_id" ref="${14:ir.filters}" />}${17:
    <field name="act_user_id" ref="${16:base.user_root}" />}${19:
    <field name="act_followers" eval="[(4, ref('${18:res.partner}'))]" />}
</record>${0}

email.template.body:
${1:Human readable name} ${2:$1} ${3:$\{object.company_id.name\} <$\{(object.company_id.email or user.email)|safe\}>} ${4:$\{object.name|safe\} <$\{object.email|safe\}>} ${5} ${6} ${8:$\{object.lang\}} To whom it may concern:

} ]]${-1}> ${0}

id.description: Database ID from external ID conversion

odoo.description: Common base XML structure to be used in Odoo module data files

product.product.body:
<record id="${18:${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_product_product}" model="product.product">
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="description">${2:Description}</field>
    <field name="description_purchase">${3:${2:Description}}</field>
    <field name="description_sale">${4:${2:Description}}</field>
    <field name="categ_id" ref="${5:product.category}"/>
    <field name="standard_price">${6:0.0}</field>
    <field name="list_price">${7:0.0}</field>
    <field name="type">${8:consu|service}</field>
    <field name="uom_id" ref="${9:product.uom}"/>
    <field name="uom_po_id" ref="${10:product.uom}"/>
    <field name="taxes_id" eval="[(4, ref('${11:account.tax}'))]" />
${13:    <field name="image" type="base64" file="${12:module_name/static/img/file_name.png}"/>
}${15:    <field name="default_code">${14:PRODUCT-CODE}</field>
}${17:    <field name="ean13">${16:0000000000000}</field>
}</record>${0}

product.template.body:
<record id="${18:${1/(([A-Za-z0-9])|([^A-Za-z0-9]+))/(?2:\l$2)(?3:\_)/g}_product_template}" model="product.template">
    <field name="name">${1:Human readable name}</field>
    <field name="description">${2:Description}</field>
    <field name="description_purchase">${3:${2:Description}}</field>
    <field name="description_sale">${4:${2:Description}}</field>
    <field name="categ_id" ref="${5:product.category}"/>
    <field name="standard_price">${6:0.0}</field>
    <field name="list_price">${7:0.0}</field>
    <field name="type">${8:consu|service}</field>
    <field name="uom_id" ref="${9:product.uom}"/>
    <field name="uom_po_id" ref="${10:product.uom}"/>
    <field name="taxes_id" eval="[(4, ref('${11:account.tax}'))]" />
${13:    <field name="image" type="base64" file="${12:module_name/static/img/file_name.png}"/>
}${15:    <field name="default_code">${14:PRODUCT-CODE}</field>
}${17:    <field name="ean13">${16:0000000000000}</field>
}</record>${0}
